About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I'm a front-end engineer and a thesis student of MS Computer Science at Linköping University. I enjoy designing and implementing personalized software solutions for people and have therefore worked on projects like photo sharing platforms with authorized access, a registration portal for drivers, generalized EMS, and a human resource management system. I have 2+ years of hands-on experience in effectively translating design to front-end code, estimating time, determining developer requirements and specifications, and collaborating with creative and development teams for the successful execution of ideas and projects. I'd love to combine my passion for designing solutions with my front-end development skills to continue building personalized software solutions for people.
